Package ipp.estg.database.models

Class User

java.lang.Object
ipp.estg.database.models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a user in the system. It includes user details such as username, email, password, and user type, as well as the approval status and the approver's ID.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(int id, String username, String email, String password, UserTypes userType, Boolean isApproved)
      Constructor to initialize a User object with the given parameters. This constructor hashes the password and sets the approval status.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the user.
      username - the username of the user.
      email - the email address of the user.
      password - the password of the user (will be hashed).
      userType - the type of the user (e.g., Low, Medium, High).
      isApproved - the approval status of the user.

    • User

      public User(int id, String username, String email, String password, UserTypes userType)
      Constructor to initialize a User object with the given parameters. This constructor hashes the password and sets the approval status based on the user type.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the user.
      username - the username of the user.
      email - the email address of the user.
      password - the password of the user (will be hashed).
      userType - the type of the user (e.g., Low, Medium, High).

    • isApproved

      public boolean isApproved()
      Gets the approval status of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is approved, false otherwise.

    • getApprovedBy

      public int getApprovedBy()
      Gets the ID of the user who approved this user.
      Returns:
      the ID of the approver, or -1 if not applicable.

    • setApproved

      public void setApproved(boolean approved, int aprovedBy)
      Sets the approval status and the ID of the user who approved this user.
      Parameters:
      approved - the approval status of the user.
      aprovedBy - the ID of the user who approved this user.

    • canApproveUsers

      public boolean canApproveUsers(UserTypes typeToApprove)
      Determines whether the user can approve other users based on their type.
      Parameters:
      typeToApprove - the type of user to be approved.
      Returns:
      true if the user can approve users of the given type, false otherwise.

    • canApproveMassEvacuationRequests

      public boolean canApproveMassEvacuationRequests()
      Determines whether the user can approve mass evacuation requests.
      Returns:
      true if the user can approve mass evacuation requests, false otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the User object. The string includes the user's ID, username, email, password, user type, approval status, and approver ID.
